channel.title: life on what did I learn today
channel.description: Recent content in life on what did I learn today

item.title: open a folder from terminal
item.description: open a finder in the terminal of a mac if you need to open a finder window you can just type open or if you want to open the finder with the folder that you are in as the path you can type open . and like that you have magically opened the folder and you are good to go.

item.title: muting a microwave
item.description: Microware muting Ok fine usually I will talk about tech things and IT things, but this is a quality of life thing. It turns out that you can mute your microwave. While i never thought that this would be a thing, it does make really good sense and yea, that should be a thing. 30 seconds later I googled “mute microwave” and low and behold. whirlpool microwave: keypad mute: press and hold 1 for 3 seconds hear "beep beep" end of cycle mute: pread and hold 2 for 3 seconds hear "beep beep"
